minimum_req: Desktop computer (e.g. optimized for wider screens)
input_data_formats: Widely used file formats (CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)
output_data_formats: Widely used file formats (CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)
name: Final ALS
description: Final ALS is a spreadsheet-based model (Excel) for economic and financial evaluation of projects. This version includes tables modelling crops requirements transferred to revenues and expenditures. From that cash flow items financial criteria are calculated: NPV, IRR and NPV annual equivalent value. The results are presented in both graphical and tabular forms. Addition analyses are also available: sensitivity analyses and the minimum price calculation. The main advantage is the model flexibility, it is very easy to add new cost and revenues items to the project calculation or to change the comparison time.
developers: Martin Benes, Jaroslav Knapek, Jan Weger
organizations: Czech Technical University, Faculty for Electrical Engeneering, Prague, Czechia; Landscape Research Institute, Department of Phytoenergy, Průhonice
contact: Martin Benes benes@fel.cvut.cz; Jaroslav Knapek knapek@fel.cvut.cz; Jan Weger weger@vukoz.cz
tool_project_name: DigitAF - DIGItal Tools to boost AgroForestry
access_procedure: Access to this tool is available upon request via email.
